title: Axe's Devotion
description: She’s a new face, and something I need to have.AxeEveryone left and now I’m picking up the pieces. After the fire, what could I expect? We know who was behind it and the club is ready for a fight. No one fucks with us and gets away with it, but I’d be lyin’ if I said I wasn’t distracted.I can’t stop staring at her. There are plenty of reasons I shouldn’t go after her, the biggest being she’s Kenny’s friend, but I couldn’t care less.When I see something I want, I go after it, regardless if there’s a threat right around the corner.
author: E.C. Land
